name: The Knock-off of Bongo Jr 2
description:
After Bongo found Gaspan and slayed him, Princess Zorgo was rescued and returned order to Cream Land. But for some reason, Santa Clause pushed Bongo jr. off a cliff after the restoration of Cream Land (To find out why, find all the secrets in The Knock-off of Bongo Jr.) In Bongo Junior’s absence, Gaspan returned and kidnapped Princess Zorgo again. Gaspan started to send out lots of more minions of different shapes and sizes. Gaspan hid himself and Princess Zorgo somewhere no one would ever be able to find for centuries. Cream Land began to fall into ruin once again.

When Bongo jr. wakes up from the fall, he looks around. There is a cave in front of him, so he decides to go in. Inside, he finds the old man who helped him save Zorgo the first time. “Hello, Bongo jr.” he says, “It seems we meet again. Because Zorgo is gone forever, you must go to the Temple of Time.”
